mapper.select: select a.patientId as "patientId", b.roomNo as "roomNo", b.bedNo as "bedNo", b.patientName as "patientName", a.temperature as "temperature", a.bloodPressure as "bloodPressure", a.pulse as "pulse", a.breathing as "breathing", a.bloodSugar as "bloodSugar", a.vein as "vein", a.measureTime as "measureTime", c.user_id as "userId", c.user_name as "userName" from sign a LEFT JOIN patient b on a.patientId = b.patientId LEFT JOIN user c on a.userId = c.user_id where 1=1 and if(#{patientId} is null,0=0,a.patientId=#{patientId}) and if(#{name} is null,0=0, b.patientName like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')) and if(#{start} is null,0=0,a.measureTime >= #{start}) and if(#{end} is null,0=0,a.measureTime <= #{end}) and if(#{wardNo} is null,0=0,b.roomNo=#{wardNo}) and if(#{bedNo} is null,0=0,b.bedNo=#{bedNo}) order by a.patientId,a.measureTime
